parameters.name: PipelineId
parameters.description: The ID of the batch. You can call the [DescribeChangeOrder](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/zh/sae/serverless-app-engine-classic/developer-reference/api-sae-2019-05-06-describechangeorder-old?spm=a2c63.p38356.help-menu-search-118957.d\_0) operation to obtain the ID.
